content: in this legal case a court in rome made a final ruling between two parties referred to as fu gr and fu au the case involved the dissolution of a coownership of two properties and the division of the proceeds the court partially granted fu grs application and ordered fu au to pay €2307500 to fu gr the court also rejected fu aus counterclaim it determined that fu gr had the right to exclusive use of one property and ordered fu au to pay an occupation indemnity the court also ordered the transfer of sums due to both parties various legal principles and evidence were considered in reaching the decision claims for compensation and reimbursement of expenses were rejected a draft distribution of the proceeds was approved and the costs of the case were determined the judge made a final ruling on july 13 2018 partially granting fus application and ordering payments to be made the ruling was deposited with the secretary on october 6 2023
